snippet: Neptalí Segovia, a veteran crossword writer, is accused of hiding a coded message urging the death of President Hugo Chavez’s brother, who is the governor of Barinas State.
abstract: Neptali Segovia, a veteran crossword writer, is accused of hiding a coded message urging the death of Venezuelan Pres Hugo Chavez’s brother, who is governor of Barinas State; Segovia dismisses allegations.
lead_paragraph: Neptalí Segovia, a veteran crossword writer, is accused of hiding a coded message urging the death of President Hugo Chavez’s brother, who is the governor of Barinas State.

headline.seo: Crossword Puzzle Stirs Controversy in Venezuela
headline.main: Crossword Puzzle Stirs Controversy in Venezuela
headline.print_headline: One Across: It Stirred Controversy In Venezuela
